QuestData.Title: Dirty Deeds
QuestData.Description: What Draaka requires is a magnet of sorts - something that her demonic missiles will be drawn to.$b$b<Durak grins slyly.>$b$bI happen to know of a method that should suit our purposes.$b$bYou scour the mines for fist-sized chunks of ore, while I prepare a special... enchantment.
QuestData.LogDescription: Search the piles of Fresh Rubble to find 10 Chunks of Ore.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you collected the ore we need?
QuestData.RewardText: Well done! These should hold a curse long enough for our purposes....
